name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, milk, eggs, and sugar until smooth. Heat a pan, melt butter, pour batter and cook until golden on both sides. Serve with fresh fruit.

name: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta until al dente. Saut√© onion and garlic in butter, add chopped tomatoes and simmer into sauce. Toss pasta in sauce and serve with grated cheese.

name: Cheesy Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Beat eggs with milk. Melt butter in a pan, pour egg mixture and gently scramble until almost set. Sprinkle cheese, finish cooking and serve hot.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables. Stir-fry garlic and onion, add chicken until cooked, toss in vegetables and soy sauce. Serve over rice.

name: Avocado Yogurt Dip
instructions: Mash avocado, mix with yogurt, minced garlic, and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with veggies or crackers.

name: Banana Oatmeal
instructions: Cook oats in milk until creamy. Slice banana on top, drizzle honey and serve warm.
